example.title: Dynamic Loading
example.metakeywords: php treeview, php tree view, php tree, ajax treeview, php ajax treeview, treeview drag and drop, php treeview mysql, kooltreeview
example.metadescription: KoolTreeView is the excellent treeview control for PHP, combining highly-efficient rendering and AJAX Load on Demand support for superior performance.
example.description:
KoolTreeView supports dynamic loading feature. The tree nodes will be loaded on-demand. To enable this feature, you need to use KoolAjax and provide the service page parameter inside Add() function of KoolTreeView.

This feature helps to improve performance when you have very large tree to render.
